attributes.action: Arm all police and armed forces and deploy whilst the U.K. Is on high alert
attributes.additional_details: All we ask is that we are given the chance to have a vote on what we feel is needed. For all our protection. It's like not having trident as a deterrent. Or the armed forces not being Armed. We the British public feel now is the time for a dramatic change In policy from our government and representatives in the House of Lords
attributes.background: We the British public are asking for our protection and for the protection of our emergency services including response units and armed forces personel to be considered as realistic and needed whilst the Uk is on high alert. Both the police and armed forces should be visably armed at all times
